typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		code2 as string,
		map_code_type_id as long,
		source_code_key as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_long_descr as string,
		target_code as string,
		source_code_field1 as string,
		source_code_field2 as string,
		source_code_field3 as string,
		source_code_field4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select code2, map_code_type_id, source_code_key, source_system, om_x_ref, target_long_descr, target_code, source_code_field1,source_code_field2,source_code_field3,source_code_field4\nfrom dwh_stage.map_code_values',
	format: 'query') ~> OmMapCodeValues
source(output(
		map_code_type_id_codeType as long,
		map_code_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select map_code_type_id as map_code_type_id_codeType, map_code_type \nfrom dwh_stage.map_code_type\nwhere map_code_type_id in (329, 106,122,113,50,45,124,367,219,374,151,167, 101, 100, 180, 108, 107,    \n370,117,112,466, 136,179,404, 157, 148, 391,127,116, 464,384,161, 198 ,109,771,770,\n774,775,773,772,776,777,127,169,170,460,785,787,788,791,786,792,794,123,793,795,797,\n798,796,800,801,368,802,803,804,806,807,407,809,811,812,813,816,827,828)',
	format: 'query') ~> OmMapCodeType
RemoveSourceCodeFieldColumns, OmMapCodeType join(map_code_type_id == map_code_type_id_codeType,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> codeTypeCodeValues
codeTypeCodeValues derive(source_code_key = case(source_system =='PARIS' && contains([122,173], 
#item == map_code_type_id),source_code_key,source_code_key)) ~> DerivedSourceCodeKey
DerivedSourceCodeKey select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key,
		source_system,
		target_code,
		target_description = target_long_descr,
		code_type = map_code_type,
		code_type_id = map_code_type_id,
		code2,
		om_x_ref
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTcrossReference
SelectTcrossReference aggregate(groupBy(source_code_key,
		source_system,
		target_code,
		target_description,
		code_type_id,
		code2,
		om_x_ref),
	code_type = first(code_type)) ~> Deduplicate
OmMapCodeValues filter(!contains([source_code_field1,source_code_field2,source_code_field3,source_code_field4],#item=='created_by')) ~> FilterSourceCodeFields
FilterSourceCodeFields select(mapColumn(
		code2,
		map_code_type_id,
		source_code_key,
		source_system,
		om_x_ref,
		target_long_descr,
		target_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveSourceCodeFieldColumns
Deduplicate sink(input(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		code_type_id,
		code2,
		target_description,
		source_system,
		om_x_ref,
		target_code,
		code_type,
		source_code_key
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tCrossReference
